name: AncientMegatheriummon
effect: [When Digivolving] For each card with [Hybrid] in its traits in this Digimon's digivolution cards, trash 1 digivolution card from the bottom of each of your opponent's Digimon. Then, for each Digimon your opponent has with no digivolution cards, ＜Draw 2＞. (Draw 2 cards from your deck.) [On Deletion] You may play 1 blue level 4 or lower card with [Hybrid] in its traits from your hand without paying its memory cost.
